review: I bought Amazon Fire TV in order view Sling, the new online based TV service.  I am planning on dropping DirecTV now since Amazon Fire TV and Sling give me all I need for my 'cable TV' viewing.  I am a 19 year DirecTV subscriber and my bill just keeps going up and up.Amazon Fire TV is great!  It was very easy to hook up to my TV and my WiFi.  I think it took about 10 minutes total to get it up and running.I am an Amazon Prime member so I can view all my Prime content on Amazon Fire TV as well.  I am still exploring and learning because there are so many apps to try.I also enjoy that I can listen to music via iHeart Radio, Amazon Music, etc.It has an HDMI output for HDTVs.  The picture quality is great!It also has an Optical audio output that I will be using with my Surround Sound receiver.For the money, and all the apps available, you can't go wrong with Amazon Fire TV.
author: Don "dishfish"

review: Got the Fire for Sling TV primarily. Very good remote compared to the Apple TV - apple's remote is too small for my hand. The Amazon prime does not have much of a selection for shows that really interest me because I watch Hulu Plus. The main feature is Sling over the Apple TV.
